Fault Detection Identification and Recovery

Detailed Description

This module gathers together the key classes that support the implementation of fault detection, identification, and recovery (FDIR) functionalities.

The implementation of the FDIR concept is primarily based on the FDIR Check and on the Variable Monitoring design patterns (see the design pattern table).


Classes

class  DC_FdirCheck
 Encapsulation of a failure detection and isolation check and of its associated recovery action. More...

class  MonitoringProfile
 Base class from which all monitoring profile classes are derived. More...

 Punctual action that performs a recovery action. More...
